commit message:
Change 'an' to 'a'

The letter U, despite being a vowel, is pronounced starting with a consonant sound when speaking the name of the letter.
A/An is determined by the first sound of the following word, not by the first letter.

Merge pull request #26 from Kasijjuf/patch-1

Change 'an' to 'a'

Remove exclamation marks

From the Android Design Guidelines
(https://www.google.com/design/spec/style/writing.html#writing-capitalization-punctuation):

'Avoid exclamation points

Ask yourself, would someone shout (exclaim) that?'

Sharing a comic strip (even Dilbert) is not something I would shout about.

Merge pull request #27 from Kasijjuf/patch-2

Remove exclamation marks
